channel.title: Web client error
channel.description: i have just made my web client for my project insanity based server but, when i log in it shows all the prayer icons covering my body i got this messege on debug.bat [code] Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4300 at client.method101(client.java:7716) at client.method96(client.java:7475) at client.method114(client.java:8870) at client.method62(client.java:2935) at client.method7(client.java:1997) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:115) at client.run(client.java:4506) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)— [/code]

item.title: Web client error
item.dc:creator: @Fluoxetine Fluoxetine
item.description:
@Fluoxetine wrote:

I think you must have changed where it’s reading the sprites from, or its reading the prayer icon’s instead of the one’s for you’re characters body…

Read full topic

item.description:

i have just made my web client for my project insanity based server but, when i log in it shows all the prayer icons covering my body i got this messege on debug.bat
